      • addParameters

        public static void addParameters(Map<String,String> parameters,
                 StringBuilder uri)
        Add parameters to the uri. The parameters will be encoded.
        Parameters:
        parameters - The parameters to add.
        uri - The builder that will receive the encoded parameters.

      • decode

        public static String decode(String value)
        Decode a value using the URLDecoder and UTF-8
        Parameters:
        value - The value to decode
        Returns:
        The decoded value.

      • encode

        Encode a value using the URLEncoder and UTF-8
        Parameters:
        value - The value to encode
        Returns:
        The encoded value.

      • getParameters

        public static Map<String,String> getParameters(URI uri)
        Extract and decode query parameters from a URI and return them as a map.
        Parameters:
        uri - The uri from which the parameters should be parsed.
        Returns:
        The map containing the result.

      • parseQuery

        public static Map<String,String> parseQuery(String query)
        Extract and decode query parameters from an encoded query string
        Parameters:
        query - The raw query string of a URI or URL.
        Returns:
        The map containing the result.
